text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-substanceAdminSubstitution where concept is-a G

name: SubstanceAdminGenericSubstitution
title: SubstanceAdminGenericSubstitution
description: Substitution occurred or is permitted with another product in the same generic ingredient.
